name: phorge
description: Phorge is a fork of Phabricator that provides a self-hosted platform for code review, task tracking, wikis, and CI. It features developer tools for collaborative software development and project management.
features: Code review: Review code changes with inline comments, approval workflows, and diff visualization.
Task tracking: Manage project tasks with priorities, assignments, dependencies, and custom workflows.
Repository hosting: Host Git, Mercurial, and SVN repositories with web-based browsing and access control.
Wiki documentation: Create and maintain project documentation with Markdown support and version history.
Continuous integration: Integrate with build systems to run automated tests on code changes.
Project management: Organize work with milestones, sprints, and customizable project boards.
User authentication: Support multiple authentication methods including LDAP, OAuth, and two-factor authentication.
Herald rules: Automate workflows with conditional triggers for notifications, assignments, and actions.
Phriction wiki: Built-in wiki system for technical documentation and knowledge sharing.
Differential reviews: Conduct thorough code reviews with revision tracking and discussion threads.
Maniphest tasks: Track bugs, features, and work items with customizable fields and statuses.
Diffusion browser: Browse repository code with syntax highlighting and blame annotations.
